scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Ruth
scrape.text: If you can buy the premise that two couples would choose a very posh restaurant in which to discuss the very touchy and inflammatory subject of nasty things their children have been collaborating on, then the rest of the book will follow through for you. I was interested enough to zap right through it, even though it was apparently the worldâ€™s longest restaurant meal.
